wisdom.sentence: 4% of the women in America are beautiful and the rest hang out around here.
A bachelor is a man who never made the same mistake once.
A bachelor is a selfish, undeserving guy who has cheated some woman out of a divorce.
wisdom.author: Don Quinn

wisdom.sentence: A bachelor is an unaltared male.
A bachelor never quite gets over the idea that he is a thing of beauty and a boy for ever.
wisdom.author: Helen Rowland

wisdom.sentence: A bad marriage is like a horse with a broken leg, you can shoot the horse, but it don't fix the leg.
A beautiful man is paradise for the eyes, hell for the soul, and purgatory for the purse.
A beautiful woman is a blessing from Heaven, but a good cigar is a smoke.
wisdom.author: Kipling

wisdom.sentence: A beautiful woman is a picture which drives all beholders nobly mad.
wisdom.author: Emerson

wisdom.sentence: A boy can learn a lot from a dog: obedience, loyalty, and the importance of turning around three times before lying down.
wisdom.author: Robert Benchley

wisdom.sentence: A boy gets to be a man when a man is needed.
wisdom.author: John Steinbeck

wisdom.sentence: A diplomat is man who always remembers a woman's birthday but never her age.
wisdom.author: Robert Frost

wisdom.sentence: A diplomatic husband said to his wife, "How do you expect me to remember your birthday when you never look any older?"
A domineering man married a mere wisp of a girl.  He came back from his honeymoon a chastened man. He'd become aware of the will of the wisp.
A figure with curves always offers a lot of interesting angles.
A fool and his honey are soon parted.
A fox is a wolf who sends flowers.
wisdom.author: Ruth Weston

wisdom.sentence: A gentleman is a man who wouldn't hit a lady with his hat on.
wisdom.author: Evan Esar   [ And why not? For why does she have his hat on?  Ed.]

wisdom.sentence: A gentleman never strikes a lady with his hat on.
wisdom.author: Fred Allen

wisdom.sentence: A girl with a future avoids the man with a past.
wisdom.author: Evan Esar, "The Humor of Humor"

wisdom.sentence: A girl's best friend is her mutter.
wisdom.author: Dorothy Parker

wisdom.sentence: A girl's conscience doesn't really keep her from doing anything wrong -- it merely keeps her from enjoying it.
A good man always knows his limitations.
wisdom.author: Harry Callahan

wisdom.sentence: A good marriage would be between a blind wife and deaf husband.
wisdom.author: Michel de Montaigne

wisdom.sentence: A guy has to get fresh once in a while so a girl doesn't lose her confidence.
A hammer sometimes misses its mark - a bouquet never.
A husband is what is left of the lover after the nerve has been extracted.
wisdom.author: Helen Rowland

wisdom.sentence: A lady is one who never shows her underwear unintentionally.
wisdom.author: Lillian Day

wisdom.sentence: A man always needs to remember one thing about a beautiful woman.  Somewhere, somebody's tired of her.
A man always remembers his first love with special tenderness, but after that begins to bunch them.
wisdom.author: Mencken

wisdom.sentence: A man can have two, maybe three love affairs while he's married.  After that it's cheating.
wisdom.author: Yves Montand

wisdom.sentence: A man does not look behind the door unless he has stood there himself.
wisdom.author: Du Bois

wisdom.sentence: A man in love is incomplete until he is married.  Then he is finished.
wisdom.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor, "Newsweek"

wisdom.sentence: A man is already halfway in love with any woman who listens to him.
wisdom.author: Brendan Francis

wisdom.sentence: A man is like a rusty wheel on a rusty cart, He sings his song as he rattles along and then he falls apart.
wisdom.author: Richard Thompson

wisdom.sentence: A man may be so much of everything that he is nothing of anything.
wisdom.author: Samuel Johnson

wisdom.sentence: A man may sometimes be forgiven the kiss to which he is not entitled, but never the kiss he has not the initiative to claim.
A man usually falls in love with a woman who asks the kinds of questions he is able to answer.
wisdom.author: Ronald Colman

wisdom.sentence: A man without a woman is like a statue without pigeons.
A man wrapped up in himself makes a very small package.
A man's gotta know his limitations.
wisdom.author: Clint Eastwood, "Dirty Harry"

wisdom.sentence: A modest woman, dressed out in all her finery, is the most tremendous object in the whole creation.
wisdom.author: Goldsmith

wisdom.sentence: A mother takes twenty years to make a man of her boy, and another woman makes a fool of him in twenty minutes.
wisdom.author: Frost

wisdom.sentence: A pedestal is as much a prison as any small, confined space.
wisdom.author: Gloria Steinem

wisdom.sentence: A pretty woman can do anything; an ugly woman must do everything.
A psychiatrist is a fellow who asks you a lot of expensive questions your wife asks you for nothing.
wisdom.author: Joey Adams

wisdom.sentence: A pushy romeo asked a gorgeous elevator operator, "Don't all these stops and starts get you pretty worn out?"  "It isn't the stops and starts that get on my nerves, it's the jerks."
A real gentleman never takes bases unless he really has to.
wisdom.author: Overheard in an algebra lecture.

wisdom.sentence: A wife lasts only for the length of the marriage, but an ex-wife is there *for the rest of your life*.
wisdom.author: Jim Samuels

wisdom.sentence: A woman can look both moral and exciting -- if she also looks as if it were quite a struggle.
wisdom.author: Edna Ferber

wisdom.sentence: A woman can never be too rich or too thin.
A woman did what a woman had to, the best way she knew how. To do more was impossible, to do less, unthinkable.
wisdom.author: Dirisha, "The Man Who Never Missed"

wisdom.sentence: A woman forgives the audacity of which her beauty has prompted us to be guilty.
wisdom.author: LeSage

wisdom.sentence: A woman has got to love a bad man once or twice in her life to be thankful for a good one.
wisdom.author: Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings

wisdom.sentence: A woman is like your shadow; follow her, she flies; fly from her, she follows.
wisdom.author: Chamfort

wisdom.sentence: A woman may very well form a friendship with a man, but for this to endure, it must be assisted by a little physical antipathy.
wisdom.author: Nietzsche

wisdom.sentence: A woman shouldn't have to buy her own perfume.
wisdom.author: Maurine Lewis

wisdom.sentence: A woman without a man is like a fish without a bicycle.
wisdom.author: Gloria Steinem

wisdom.sentence: A woman without a man is like a fish without a bicycle. Therefore, a man without a woman is like a bicycle without a fish.
A woman's best protection is a little money of her own.
wisdom.author: Clare Booth Luce, quoted in "The Wit of Women"

wisdom.sentence: A woman's place is in the house... and in the Senate.
A woman, especially if she have the misfortune of knowing anything, should conceal it as well as she can.
wisdom.author: Jane Austen

wisdom.sentence: A young husband with an inferiority complex insisted he was just a little pebble on the beach.  The marriage counselor told him, "If you wish to save your marriage, you'd better be a little boulder."
AAAAAAAAAaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaccccccccckkkkkk!!!!!!!!! You brute!  Knock before entering a ladies room!
Ain't nothin' an old man can do for me but bring me a message from a young man.
wisdom.author: Moms Mabley

wisdom.sentence: Alimony is a system by which, when two people make a mistake, one of them continues to pay for it.
wisdom.author: Peggy Joyce

wisdom.sentence: Alimony is like buying oats for a dead horse.
wisdom.author: Arthur Baer

wisdom.sentence: Alimony is the curse of the writing classes.
wisdom.author: Norman Mailer

wisdom.sentence: All heiresses are beautiful.
wisdom.author: John Dryden

wisdom.sentence: All husbands are alike, but they have different faces so you can tell them apart.
All most men really want in life is a wife, a house, two kids and a car, a cat, no maybe a dog. Ummm, scratch one of the kids and add a dog. Definitely a dog.
All the men on my staff can type.
wisdom.author: Bella Abzug

wisdom.sentence: All work and no pay makes a housewife.
An optimist is a man who looks forward to marriage. A pessimist is a married optimist.
Any girl can be glamorous; all you have to do is stand still and look stupid.
wisdom.author: Hedy Lamarr

wisdom.sentence: Any woman is a volume if one knows how to read her.
Anyone who says he can see through women is missing a lot.
wisdom.author: Groucho Marx

wisdom.sentence: At last I've found the girl of my dreams.  Last night she said to me, "Once more, Strange, and this time *I'll* be Donnie and *you* be Marie.
wisdom.author: Strange de Jim

wisdom.sentence: Bachelors' wives and old maids' children are always perfect.
wisdom.author: Nicolas Chamfort

wisdom.sentence: Basically my wife was immature.  I'd be at home in the bath and she'd come in and sink my boats.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen

wisdom.sentence: Be circumspect in your liaisons with women.  It is better to be seen at the opera with a man than at mass with a woman.
wisdom.author: De Maintenon

wisdom.sentence: Be prepared to accept sacrifices.  Vestal virgins aren't all that bad.
Beauty seldom recommends one woman to another.
Beauty, brains, availability, personality; pick any two.
Before marriage the three little words are "I love you," after marriage they are "Let's eat out."
Behind every successful man you'll find a woman with nothing to wear.
Being owned by someone used to be called slavery -- now it's called commitment.
Bigamy is having one spouse too many.  Monogamy is the same.
Birds and bees have as much to do with the facts of life as black nightgowns do with keeping warm.
wisdom.author: Hester Mundis, "Powermom"

wisdom.sentence: Boys are beyond the range of anybody's sure understanding, at least when they are between the ages of 18 months and 90 years.
wisdom.author: James Thurber

wisdom.sentence: Boys will be boys, and so will a lot of middle-aged men.
wisdom.author: Kin Hubbard

wisdom.sentence: Brigands will demand your money or your life, but a woman will demand both.
wisdom.author: Samuel Butler

wisdom.sentence: By all means marry: If you get a good wife, you'll become happy; if you get a bad one, you'll become a philosopher.
wisdom.author: Socrates

wisdom.sentence: Changing husbands/wives is only changing troubles.
wisdom.author: Kathleen Norris

wisdom.sentence: Choose in marriage only a woman whom you would choose as a friend if she were a man.
wisdom.author: Joubert

wisdom.sentence: Courtship to marriage, as a very witty prologue to a very dull play.
wisdom.author: William Congreve

wisdom.sentence: Darling: the popular form of address used in speaking to a member of the opposite sex whose name you cannot at the moment remember.
wisdom.author: Oliver Herford

wisdom.sentence: Do not permit a woman to ask forgiveness, for that is only the first step.  The second is justification of herself by accusation of you.
wisdom.author: DeGourmont

wisdom.sentence: Do you think your mother and I should have lived comfortably so long together if ever we had been married?
Don't assume that every sad-eyed woman has loved and lost -- she may have got him.
Don't know what time I'll be back, Mom.  Probably soon after she throws me out.
Don't marry for money; you can borrow it cheaper.
wisdom.author: Scottish Proverb

wisdom.sentence: Dull women have immaculate homes.
Economists are still trying to figure out why the girls with the least principle draw the most interest.
Eighty percent of married men cheat in America.  The rest cheat in Europe.
wisdom.author: Jackie Mason

wisdom.sentence: ... eighty years later he could still recall with the young pang of his original joy his falling in love with Ada.
wisdom.author: Nabokov

wisdom.sentence: "Even nowadays a man can't step up and kill a woman without feeling just a bit unchivalrous ..."
wisdom.author: Robert Benchley

wisdom.sentence: Every man who is high up likes to think that he has done it all himself, and the wife smiles and lets it go at that.
wisdom.author: Barrie

wisdom.sentence: Everybody is given the same amount of hormones, at birth, and if you want to use yours for growing hair, that's fine with me.
Farmers in the Iowa State survey rated machinery breakdowns more stressful than divorce.
wisdom.author: Wall Street Journal

wisdom.sentence: Feminists just want the human race to be a tie.
First love is only a little foolishness and a lot of curiosity, no really self-respecting woman would take advantage of it.
wisdom.author: George Bernard Shaw, "John Bull's Other Island"

wisdom.sentence: Flirting is the gentle art of making a man feel pleased with himself.
wisdom.author: Helen Rowland

wisdom.sentence: For I swore I would stay a year away from her; out and alas! but with break of day I went to make supplication.
wisdom.author: Paulus Silentarius, c. 540 A.D.

wisdom.sentence: Fortunate is he for whom the belle toils.
if all men have made at least once.  There are community colleges that offer courses to help men get over this need; alas, these classes rarely prove effective.
Fred noticed his roommate had a black eye upon returning from a dance. "What happened?"  "I was struck by the beauty of the place."
Genuine happiness is when a wife sees a double chin on her husband's old girl friend.
Girls are better looking in snowstorms.
wisdom.author: Archie Goodwin

wisdom.sentence: Girls really do know just what they want -- you to figure it out for yourself!
Girls who throw themselves at men, are actually taking very careful aim.
Give a woman an inch and she'll park a car in it.
God created a few perfect heads.  The rest he covered with hair.
God created woman.  And boredom did indeed cease from that moment -- but many other things ceased as well.  Woman was God's second mistake.
wisdom.author: Nietzsche

wisdom.sentence: Good girls go to heaven, bad girls go everywhere.
He gave her a look that you could have poured on a waffle.
He who enters his wife's dressing room is a philosopher or a fool.
wisdom.author: Balzac

wisdom.sentence: Hey, Jim, it's me, Susie Lillis from the laundromat.  You said you were gonna call and it's been two weeks.  What's wrong, you lose my number?
High heels are a device invented by a woman who was tired of being kissed on the forehead.
His designs were strictly honourable, as the phrase is: that is, to rob a lady of her fortune by way of marriage.
wisdom.author: Henry Fielding, "Tom Jones"

wisdom.sentence: "Home, Sweet Home" must surely have been written by a bachelor.
wisdom.author: Samuel Butler

wisdom.sentence: Horace's best ode would not please a young woman as much as the mediocre verses of the young man she is in love with.
wisdom.author: Moore

wisdom.sentence: How much for your women?  I want to buy your daughter... how much for the little girl?
wisdom.author: Jake Blues, "The Blues Brothers"

wisdom.sentence: "How would I know if I believe in love at first sight?" the sexy social climber said to her roommate.  "I mean, I've never seen a Porsche full of money before."
I am very fond of the company of ladies.  I like their beauty, I like their delicacy, I like their vivacity, and I like their silence.
wisdom.author: Samuel Johnson

wisdom.sentence: I believe a little incompatibility is the spice of life, particularly if he has income and she is pattable.
wisdom.author: Ogden Nash

wisdom.sentence: I can't mate in captivity.
wisdom.author: Gloria Steinem, on why she has never married.

wisdom.sentence: I come from a small town whose population never changed.  Each time a woman got pregnant, someone left town.
wisdom.author: Michael Prichard

wisdom.sentence: I do enjoy a good long walk -- especially when my wife takes one.
"I don't have to take this abuse from you -- I've got hundreds of people waiting to abuse me."
wisdom.author: Bill Murray, "Ghostbusters"

wisdom.sentence: I have a hard time being attracted to anyone who can beat me up.
wisdom.author: John McGrath, Atlanta sportswriter, on women weightlifters.

wisdom.sentence: I know the disposition of women: when you will, they won't; when you won't, they set their hearts upon you of their own inclination.
wisdom.author: Publius Terentius Afer (Terence)

wisdom.sentence: I learned to play guitar just to get the girls, and anyone who says they didn't is just lyin'!
wisdom.author: Willie Nelson

wisdom.sentence: I like being single.  I'm always there when I need me.
wisdom.author: Art Leo

wisdom.sentence: I like myself, but I won't say I'm as handsome as the bull that kidnapped Europa.
wisdom.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

wisdom.sentence: I like young girls.  Their stories are shorter.
wisdom.author: Tom McGuane

wisdom.sentence: I love being married.  It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
wisdom.author: Rita Rudner

wisdom.sentence: I love Mickey Mouse more than any woman I've ever known.
wisdom.author: Walt Disney

wisdom.sentence: I married beneath me.  All women do.
wisdom.author: Lady Nancy Astor

wisdom.sentence: I met a wonderful new man.  He's fictional, but you can't have everything.
wisdom.author: Cecelia, "The Purple Rose of Cairo"

wisdom.sentence: I never expected to see the day when girls would get sunburned in the places they do today.
wisdom.author: Will Rogers

wisdom.sentence: I never met a woman I couldn't drink pretty.
I read Playboy for the same reason I read National Geographic. To see the sights I'm never going to visit.
I refuse to consign the whole male sex to the nursery. I insist on believing that some men are my equals.
wisdom.author: Brigid Brophy

wisdom.sentence: I respect the institution of marriage. I have always thought that every woman should marry -- and no man.
wisdom.author: Benjamin Disraeli, "Lothair"

wisdom.sentence: I sat down beside her, said hello, offered to buy her a drink... and then natural selection reared its ugly head.
I think she must have been very strictly brought up, she's so desperately anxious to do the wrong thing correctly.
wisdom.author: Saki, "Reginald on Worries"

wisdom.sentence: I think the world is ready for the story of an ugly duckling, who grew up to remain an ugly duckling, and lived happily ever after.
wisdom.author: Chick

wisdom.sentence: I want to buy a husband who, every week when I sit down to watch "St. Elsewhere", won't scream, "Forget it, Blanche... It's time for Hee-Haw!"
wisdom.author: Berke Breathed, "Bloom County"

wisdom.sentence: I want to marry a girl just like the girl that married dear old dad.
wisdom.author: Freud

wisdom.sentence: I was in a beauty contest one. I not only came in last, I was hit in the mouth by Miss Congeniality.
wisdom.author: Phyllis Diller

wisdom.sentence: I wasn't kissing her, I was whispering in her mouth.
wisdom.author: Chico Marx

wisdom.sentence: I will not say that women have no character; rather, they have a new one every day.
wisdom.author: Heine

wisdom.sentence: I would gladly raise my voice in praise of women, only they won't let me raise my voice.
wisdom.author: Winkle

wisdom.sentence: I wouldn't marry her with a ten foot pole.
I'd probably settle for a vampire if he were romantic enough. Couldn't be any worse than some of the relationships I've had.
wisdom.author: Brenda Starr

wisdom.sentence: I'd rather have two girls at 21 each than one girl at 42.
wisdom.author: W.C. Fields

wisdom.sentence: I'm defending her honor, which is more than she ever did.
I'm not denyin' the women are foolish: God Almighty made 'em to match the men.
wisdom.author: George Eliot

wisdom.sentence: I'm very old-fashioned.  I believe that people should marry for life, like pigeons and Catholics.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen

wisdom.sentence: I've been in more laps than a napkin.
wisdom.author: Mae West

wisdom.sentence: If I had to live my life again, I'd make the same mistakes, only sooner.
wisdom.author: Tallulah Bankhead

wisdom.sentence: If I told you you had a beautiful body, would you hold it against me?
If it were not for the presents, an elopement would be preferable.
wisdom.author: George Ade, "Forty Modern Fables"

wisdom.sentence: If men acted after marriage as they do during courtship, there would be fewer divorces -- and more bankruptcies.
wisdom.author: Frances Rodman

wisdom.sentence: If the girl you love moves in with another guy once, it's more than enough. Twice, it's much too much.  Three times, it's the story of your life.
If there is any realistic deterrent to marriage, it's the fact that you can't afford divorce.
wisdom.author: Jack Nicholson

wisdom.sentence: If we men married the women we deserved, we should have a very bad time of it.
wisdom.author: Oscar Wilde

wisdom.sentence: If women didn't exist, all the money in the world would have no meaning.
wisdom.author: Aristotle Onassis

wisdom.sentence: If you are afraid of loneliness, don't marry.
wisdom.author: Anton Chekhov

wisdom.sentence: If you are looking for a kindly, well-to-do older gentleman who is no longer interested in sex, take out an ad in The Wall Street Journal.
wisdom.author: Abigail Van Buren

wisdom.sentence: If you give a man enough rope, he'll claim he's tied up at the office.
If you marry a man who cheats on his wife, you'll be married to a man who cheats on his wife.
wisdom.author: Ann Landers

wisdom.sentence: If you MUST get married, it is always advisable to marry beauty. Otherwise, you'll never find anybody to take her off your hands.
If you want me to be a good little bunny just dangle some carats in front of my nose.
wisdom.author: Lauren Bacall

wisdom.sentence: If you want to be ruined, marry a rich woman.
wisdom.author: Michelet

wisdom.sentence: If you want to read about love and marriage you've got to buy two separate books.
wisdom.author: Alan King

wisdom.sentence: If you want your spouse to listen and pay strict attention to every word you say, talk in your sleep.
If you wish women to love you, be original; I know a man who wore fur boots summer and winter, and women fell in love with him.
wisdom.author: Anton Chekhov

wisdom.sentence: In buying horses and taking a wife shut your eyes tight and commend yourself to God.
In Christianity, a man may have only one wife. This is called Monotony.
In marriage, as in war, it is permitted to take every advantage of the enemy.
In olden times sacrifices were made at the altar -- a practice which is still continued.
wisdom.author: Helen Rowland

wisdom.sentence: Insanity is considered a ground for divorce, though by the very same token it is the shortest detour to marriage.
wisdom.author: Wilson Mizner

wisdom.sentence: Is a wedding successful if it comes off without a hitch?
Isn't it ironic that many men spend a great part of their lives avoiding marriage while single-mindedly pursuing those things that would make them better prospects?
It [marriage] happens as with cages: the birds without despair to get in, and those within despair of getting out.
wisdom.author: Michel Eyquem de Montaigne

wisdom.sentence: It doesn't much signify whom one marries, for one is sure to find out next morning it was someone else.
wisdom.author: Will Rogers

wisdom.sentence: It is idle to attempt to talk a young woman out of her passion: love does not lie in the ear.
wisdom.author: Walpole

wisdom.sentence: It is now quite lawful for a Catholic woman to avoid pregnancy by a resort to mathematics, though she is still forbidden to resort to physics and chemistry.
wisdom.author: H.L. Mencken

wisdom.sentence: It is possible that blondes also prefer gentlemen.
wisdom.author: Maimie Van Doren

wisdom.sentence: It takes a smart husband to have the last word and not use it.
It wasn't exactly a divorce -- I was traded.
wisdom.author: Tim Conway

wisdom.sentence: It's a funny thing that when a woman hasn't got anything on earth to worry about, she goes off and gets married.
"It's men like him that give the Y chromosome a bad name."
It's not the inital skirt length, it's the upcreep.
It's not the men in my life, but the life in my men that counts.
wisdom.author: Mae West

wisdom.sentence: It's the good girls who keep the diaries, the bad girls never have the time.
wisdom.author: Tallulah Bankhead

wisdom.sentence: It's the theory of Jess Birnbaum, of Time magazine, that women with bad legs should stick to long skirts because they cover a multitude of shins.
Keep a diary and one day it'll keep you.
wisdom.author: Mae West

wisdom.sentence: Keep your eyes wide open before marriage, half shut afterwards.
wisdom.author: Benjamin Franklin

wisdom.sentence: Kissing your hand may make you feel very good, but a diamond and sapphire bracelet lasts for ever.
wisdom.author: Anita Loos, "Gentlemen Prefer Blondes"

wisdom.sentence: Large increases in cost with questionable increases in performance can be tolerated only in race horses and women.
wisdom.author: Lord Kalvin

wisdom.sentence: Let thy maid servant be faithful, strong, and homely.
wisdom.author: Benjamin Franklin

wisdom.sentence: Life begins at the centerfold and expands outward.
wisdom.author: Miss November, 1966

wisdom.sentence: Life's too short to dance with ugly women.
Like all young men, you greatly exaggerate the difference between one young woman and another.
wisdom.author: George Bernard Shaw, "Major Barbara"

wisdom.sentence: Like the ski resort of girls looking for husbands and husbands looking for girls, the situation is not as symmetrical as it might seem.
wisdom.author: Alan McKay

wisdom.sentence: Little girls, like butterflies, need no excuse.
wisdom.author: Lazarus Long

wisdom.sentence: Lonely men seek companionship. Lonely women sit at home and wait. They never meet.
Lots of girls can be had for a song.  Unfortunately, it often turns out to be the wedding march.
Love is an ideal thing, marriage a real thing; a confusion of the real with the ideal never goes unpunished.
wisdom.author: Goethe

wisdom.sentence: Love is an obsessive delusion that is cured by marriage.
wisdom.author: Dr. Karl Bowman

wisdom.sentence: Love is the delusion that one woman differs from another.
wisdom.author: H.L. Mencken

wisdom.sentence: Love makes fools, marriage cuckolds, and patriotism malevolent imbeciles.
wisdom.author: Paul Leautaud, "Passe-temps"

wisdom.sentence: Macho does not prove mucho.
wisdom.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

wisdom.sentence: Man and wife make one fool.
Many a man has fallen in love with a girl in a light so dim he would not have chosen a suit by it.
wisdom.author: Maurice Chevalier

wisdom.sentence: Many a man in love with a dimple makes the mistake of marrying the whole girl.
wisdom.author: Stephen Leacock

wisdom.sentence: Many a man who thinks he's going on a maiden voyage with a woman finds out later that it was just a shake-down cruise.
Many a wife thinks her husband is the world's greatest lover. But she can never catch him at it.
Many husbands go broke on the money their wives save on sales.
Marriage always demands the greatest understanding of the art of insincerity possible between two human beings.
wisdom.author: Vicki Baum

wisdom.sentence: Marriage causes dating problems.
Marriage is a ghastly public confession of a strictly private intention.
Marriage is a great institution -- but I'm not ready for an institution yet.
wisdom.author: Mae West

wisdom.sentence: Marriage is a lot like the army, everyone complains, but you'd be surprised at the large number that re-enlist.
wisdom.author: James Garner

wisdom.sentence: Marriage is a romance in which the hero dies in the first chapter.
Marriage is a three ring circus: engagement ring, wedding ring, and suffering.
wisdom.author: Roger Price

wisdom.sentence: Marriage is an institution in which two undertake to become one, and one undertakes to become nothing.
Marriage is learning about women the hard way.
Marriage is like twirling a baton, turning handsprings, or eating with chopsticks.  It looks easy until you try it.
Marriage is low down, but you spend the rest of your life paying for it.
wisdom.author: Baskins

wisdom.sentence: Marriage is not merely sharing the fettucine, but sharing the burden of finding the fettucine restaurant in the first place.
wisdom.author: Calvin Trillin

wisdom.sentence: Marriage is the only adventure open to the cowardly.
wisdom.author: Voltaire

wisdom.sentence: Marriage is the process of finding out what kind of man your wife would have preferred.
Marriage is the waste-paper basket of the emotions.
Marriage, in life, is like a duel in the midst of a battle.
wisdom.author: Edmond About

wisdom.sentence: Marriages are made in heaven and consummated on earth.
wisdom.author: John Lyly

wisdom.sentence: Marry in haste and everyone starts counting the months.
Matrimony is the root of all evil.
Matrimony isn't a word, it's a sentence.
Men are always ready to respect anything that bores them.
wisdom.author: Marilyn Monroe

wisdom.sentence: Men are those creatures with two legs and eight hands.
wisdom.author: Jayne Mansfield

wisdom.sentence: Men aren't attracted to me by my mind. They're attracted by what I don't mind...
wisdom.author: Gypsy Rose Lee

wisdom.sentence: Men have a much better time of it than women; for one thing they marry later; for another thing they die earlier.
wisdom.author: H.L. Mencken

wisdom.sentence: Men have as exaggerated an idea of their rights as women have of their wrongs.
wisdom.author: E.W. Howe

wisdom.sentence: Men live for three things, fast cars, fast women and fast food.
Men never make passes at girls wearing glasses.
wisdom.author: Dorothy Parker

wisdom.sentence: Men of quality are not afraid of women for equality.
Men say of women what pleases them; women do with men what pleases them.
wisdom.author: DeSegur

wisdom.sentence: Men seldom show dimples to girls who have pimples.
Men still remember the first kiss after women have forgotten the last.
Men who cherish for women the highest respect are seldom popular with them.
wisdom.author: Joseph Addison

wisdom.sentence: Miguel Cervantes wrote Donkey Hote.  Milton wrote Paradise Lost, then his wife died and he wrote Paradise Regained.
Moe: What did you give your wife for Valentine's Day? Joe: The usual gift -- she ate my heart out.
Money and women are the most sought after and the least known of any two things we have.
wisdom.author: The Best of Will Rogers

wisdom.sentence: Money is a powerful aphrodisiac.  But flowers work almost as well.
wisdom.author: Lazarus Long

wisdom.sentence: Monogamy is the Western custom of one wife and hardly any mistresses.
wisdom.author: H.H. Munro

wisdom.sentence: My notion of a husband at forty is that a woman should be able to change him, like a bank note, for two twenties.
Never accept an invitation from a stranger unless he gives you candy.
wisdom.author: Linda Festa

wisdom.sentence: Never argue with a woman when she's tired -- or rested.
Never eat at a place called Mom's.  Never play cards with a man named Doc. And never lie down with a woman who's got more troubles than you.
wisdom.author: Nelson Algren, "What Every Young Man Should Know"

wisdom.sentence: Never go to bed mad.  Stay up and fight.
wisdom.author: Phyllis Diller, "Phyllis Diller's Housekeeping Hints"

wisdom.sentence: Never sleep with a woman whose troubles are worse than your own.
wisdom.author: Nelson Algren

wisdom.sentence: New Year's Eve is the time of year when a man most feels his age, and his wife most often reminds him to act it.
wisdom.author: Webster's Unafraid Dictionary

wisdom.sentence: No friendship is so cordial or so delicious as that of girl for girl; no hatred so intense or immovable as that of woman for woman.
wisdom.author: Landor

wisdom.sentence: No man can have a reasonable opinion of women until he has long lost interest in hair restorers.  -- Austin O'Malley
No modern woman with a grain of sense ever sends little notes to an unmarried man -- not until she is married, anyway.
wisdom.author: Arthur Binstead

wisdom.sentence: No one knows like a woman how to say things that are at once gentle and deep.
wisdom.author: Hugo

wisdom.sentence: No self-made man ever did such a good job that some woman didn't want to make some alterations.
wisdom.author: Kim Hubbard

wisdom.sentence: No woman can call herself free until she can choose consciously whether she will or will not be a mother.
wisdom.author: Margaret H. Sanger

wisdom.sentence: No woman can endure a gambling husband, unless he is a steady winner.
wisdom.author: Lord Thomas Dewar

wisdom.sentence: No woman ever falls in love with a man unless she has a better opinion of him than he deserves.
wisdom.author: Edgar Watson Howe

wisdom.sentence: Nobody really knows what happiness is, until they're married. And then it's too late.
Not every problem someone has with his girlfriend is necessarily due to the capitalist mode of production.
wisdom.author: Herbert Marcuse

wisdom.sentence: Of all the animals, the boy is the most unmanageable.
wisdom.author: Plato

wisdom.sentence: Of course a platonic relationship is possible -- but only between husband and wife.
Once a woman has given you her heart you can never get rid of the rest of her.
wisdom.author: Vanbrugh

wisdom.sentence: One girl can be pretty -- but a dozen are only a chorus.
wisdom.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald, "The Last Tycoon"

wisdom.sentence: One is not born a woman, one becomes one.
wisdom.author: Simone de Beauvoir

wisdom.sentence: One man's folly is another man's wife.
wisdom.author: Helen Rowland

wisdom.sentence: One should always be in love.  That is the reason one should never marry.
wisdom.author: Oscar Wilde

wisdom.sentence: Only two groups of people fall for flattery -- men and women.
Rich bachelors should be heavily taxed.  It is not fair that some men should be happier than others.
wisdom.author: Oscar Wilde

wisdom.sentence: She always believed in the old adage -- leave them while you're looking good.
wisdom.author: Anita Loos, "Gentlemen Prefer Blondes"

wisdom.sentence: She been married so many times she got rice marks all over her face.
wisdom.author: Tom Waits

wisdom.sentence: She is descended from a long line that her mother listened to.
wisdom.author: Gypsy Rose Lee

wisdom.sentence: She liked him; he was a man of many qualities, even if most of them were bad.
She missed an invaluable opportunity to give him a look that you could have poured on a waffle ...
She's learned to say things with her eyes that others waste time putting into words.
She's so tough she won't take 'yes' for an answer.
She's the kind of girl who climbed the ladder of success wrong by wrong.
wisdom.author: Mae West

wisdom.sentence: So many beautiful women and so little time.
wisdom.author: John Barrymore

wisdom.sentence: So many men; so little time.
So many women; so little nerve.
So many women; so little time!
Some husbands are living proof that a woman can take a joke.
Some marriages are made in heaven -- but so are thunder and lightning.
Some men are all right in their place -- if they only the knew the right places!
wisdom.author: Mae West

wisdom.sentence: Some men are so interested in their wives' continued happiness that they hire detectives to find out the reason for it.
Some men are so macho they'll get you pregnant just to kill a rabbit.
wisdom.author: Maureen Murphy

wisdom.sentence: Some men feel that the only thing they owe the woman who marries them is a grudge.
wisdom.author: Helen Rowland

wisdom.sentence: Some of us are becoming the men we wanted to marry.
wisdom.author: Gloria Steinem

wisdom.sentence: Sometimes a cigar is just a cigar.
wisdom.author: Sigmund Freud

wisdom.sentence: Sometimes, when I think of what that girl means to me, it's all I can do to keep from telling her.
wisdom.author: Andy Capp

wisdom.sentence: Stanford women are responsible for the success of many Stanford men: they give them "just one more reason" to stay in and study every night.
Take my word for it, the silliest woman can manage a clever man, but it needs a very clever woman to manage a fool.
wisdom.author: Kipling

wisdom.sentence: Tehee quod she, and clapte the wyndow to.
wisdom.author: Geoffrey Chaucer

wisdom.sentence: That woman speaks eight languages and can't say "no" in any of them.
wisdom.author: Dorothy Parker

wisdom.sentence: The advantage of being celibate is that when one sees a pretty girl one does not need to grieve over having an ugly one back home.
wisdom.author: Paul Leautaud, "Propos d'un jour"

wisdom.sentence: The anger of a woman is the greatest evil with which you can threaten your enemies.
wisdom.author: Bonnard

wisdom.sentence: The average girl would rather have beauty than brains because she knows that the average man can see much better than he can think.
wisdom.author: Ladies' Home Journal

wisdom.sentence: The best man for the job is often a woman.
The best thing about being bald is, that, when unexpected company arrives, all you have to do is straighten your tie.
The chains of marriage are so heavy that it takes two to carry them, and sometimes three.
wisdom.author: Alexandre Dumas

wisdom.sentence: The days just prior to marriage are like a snappy introduction to a  tedious book.
The difference between legal separation and divorce is that legal separation gives the man time to hide his money.
The duration of passion is proportionate with the original resistance of the woman.
wisdom.author: Honor'e DeBalzac

wisdom.sentence: The eternal feminine draws us upward.
wisdom.author: Goethe

wisdom.sentence: The first marriage is the triumph of imagination over intelligence, and the second the triumph of hope over experience.
The gentlemen looked one another over with microscopic carelessness.
The girl who remembers her first kiss now has a daughter who can't even remember her first husband.
The girl who stoops to conquer usually wears a low-cut dress.
The girl who swears no one has ever made love to her has a right to swear.
wisdom.author: Sophia Loren

wisdom.sentence: The gods gave man fire and he invented fire engines.  They gave him love and he invented marriage.
The happiest time of a person's life is after his first divorce.
wisdom.author: J.K. Galbraith

wisdom.sentence: The heaviest object in the world is the body of the woman you have ceased to love.
wisdom.author: Marquis de Lac de Clapiers Vauvenargues

wisdom.sentence: The honeymoon is not actually over until we cease to stifle our sighs and begin to stifle our yawns.
wisdom.author: Helen Rowland

wisdom.sentence: The honeymoon is over when he phones to say he'll be late for supper and she's already left a note that it's in the refrigerator.
wisdom.author: Bill Lawrence

wisdom.sentence: The husband who doesn't tell his wife everything probably reasons that what she doesn't know won't hurt him.
wisdom.author: Leo J. Burke

wisdom.sentence: The little girl expects no declaration of tenderness from her doll. She loves it -- and that's all.  It is thus that we should love.
wisdom.author: DeGourmont

wisdom.sentence: The majority of husbands remind me of an orangutang trying to play the violin.
wisdom.author: Honor'e DeBalzac

wisdom.sentence: The man who understands one woman is qualified to understand pretty well everything.
wisdom.author: Yeats

wisdom.sentence: The mature bohemian is one whose woman works full time.
The most common form of marriage proposal: "YOU'RE WHAT!?"
The most dangerous food is wedding cake.
wisdom.author: American proverb

wisdom.sentence: The most difficult years of marriage are those following the wedding.
The most happy marriage I can imagine to myself would be the union of a deaf man to a blind woman.
wisdom.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

wisdom.sentence: The most important thing in a relationship between a man and a woman is that one of them be good at taking orders.
wisdom.author: Linda Festa

wisdom.sentence: The most popular labor-saving device today is still a husband with money.
wisdom.author: Joey Adams, "Cindy and I"

wisdom.sentence: The mother of the year should be a sterilized woman with two adopted children.
wisdom.author: Paul Ehrlich

wisdom.sentence: The one charm of marriage is that it makes a life of deception a neccessity.
wisdom.author: Oscar Wilde

wisdom.sentence: The only real argument for marriage is that it remains the best method for getting acquainted.
wisdom.author: Heywood Broun

wisdom.sentence: The only really masterful noise a man makes in a house is the noise of his key, when he is still on the landing, fumbling for the lock.
wisdom.author: Colette

wisdom.sentence: The person who marries for money usually earns every penny of it.
The prettiest women are almost always the most boring, and that is why some people feel there is no God.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen, "Without Feathers"

wisdom.sentence: The six great gifts of an Irish girl are beauty, soft voice, sweet speech, wisdom, needlework, and chastity.
wisdom.author: Theodore Roosevelt, 1907

wisdom.sentence: The surest sign that a man is in love is when he divorces his wife.
The trouble with some women is that they get all excited about nothing -- and then marry him.
wisdom.author: Cher

wisdom.sentence: The truth about a woman often lasts longer than the woman is true.
The two things that can get you into trouble quicker than anything else are fast women and slow horses.
The way to fight a woman is with your hat.  Grab it and run.
The woman you buy -- and she is the least expensive -- takes a great deal of money. The woman who gives herself takes all your time.
wisdom.author: Balzac

wisdom.sentence: There are a few things that never go out of style, and a feminine woman is one of them.
wisdom.author: Ralston

wisdom.sentence: There are three things I have always loved and never understood -- art, music, and women.
There are three things men can do with women: love them, suffer for them, or turn them into literature.
wisdom.author: Stephen Stills

wisdom.sentence: There are two times when a man doesn't understand a woman -- before marriage and after marriage.
There goes the good time that was had by all.
wisdom.author: Bette Davis, remarking on a passing starlet

wisdom.sentence: There is a vast difference between the savage and civilized man, but it is never apparent to their wives until after breakfast.
wisdom.author: Helen Rowland

wisdom.sentence: There is no such thing as an ugly woman -- there are only the ones who do not know how to make themselves attractive.
wisdom.author: Christian Dior

wisdom.sentence: There is not much to choose between a woman who deceives us for another, and a woman who deceives another for ourselves.
wisdom.author: Augier

wisdom.sentence: There is only one way to console a widow.  But remember the risk.
wisdom.author: Robert Heinlein

wisdom.sentence: There's nothing like a girl with a plunging neckline to keep a man on his toes.
There's nothing like a good dose of another woman to make a man appreciate his wife.
wisdom.author: Clare Booth Luce

wisdom.sentence: There's nothing like good food, good wine, and a bad girl.
There's one consolation about matrimony.  When you look around you can always see somebody who did worse.
wisdom.author: Warren H. Goldsmith

wisdom.sentence: There's one fool at least in every married couple.
There's only one way to have a happy marriage and as soon as I learn what it is I'll get married again.
wisdom.author: Clint Eastwood

wisdom.sentence: There's too much beauty upon this earth for lonely men to bear.
wisdom.author: Richard Le Gallienne

wisdom.sentence: 'Tis more blessed to give than receive; for example, wedding presents.
wisdom.author: H.L. Mencken

wisdom.sentence: To be beautiful is enough! if a woman can do that well who should demand more from her? You don't want a rose to sing.
wisdom.author: Thackeray

wisdom.sentence: To be considered successful, a woman must be much better at her job than a man would have to be.  Fortunately, this isn't difficult.
To be successful, a woman has to be much better at her job than a man.
wisdom.author: Golda Meir

wisdom.sentence: To err is human -- but it feels divine.
wisdom.author: Mae West

wisdom.sentence: To find out a girl's faults, praise her to her girl friends.
wisdom.author: Benjamin Franklin

wisdom.sentence: To many, total abstinence is easier than perfect moderation.
wisdom.author: St. Augustine

wisdom.sentence: To our sweethearts and wives.  May they never meet.
wisdom.author: 19th century toast

wisdom.sentence: Today when a man gets married he gets a home, a housekeeper, a cook, a cheering squad and another paycheck.  When a woman marries, she gets a boarder.
Trust your husband, adore your husband, and get as much as you can in your own name.
wisdom.author: Joan Rivers

wisdom.sentence: Twenty years of romance make a woman look like a ruin; but twenty years of marriage make her something like a public building.
wisdom.author: Oscar Wilde

wisdom.sentence: Two sure ways to tell a REALLY sexy man; the first is, he has a bad memory. I forget the second.
Until Eve arrived, this was a man's world.
wisdom.author: Richard Armour

wisdom.sentence: Valerie: Aww, Tom, you're going maudlin on me ... Tom:  I reserve the right to wax maudlin as I wane eloquent ...
wisdom.author: Tom Chapin

wisdom.sentence: We were happily married for eight months.  Unfortunately, we were married for four and a half years.
wisdom.author: Nick Faldo

wisdom.sentence: We're all looking for a woman who can sit in a mini-skirt and talk philosophy, executing both with confidence and style.
Wedding is destiny, and hanging likewise.
wisdom.author: John Heywood

wisdom.sentence: Wedding rings are the world's smallest handcuffs.
Well, it's hard for a mere man to believe that woman doesn't have equal rights.
wisdom.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

wisdom.sentence: What a misfortune to be a woman!  And yet, the worst misfortune is not to understand what a misfortune it is.
wisdom.author: Kierkegaard, 1813-1855.

wisdom.sentence: What do you give a man who has everything?  Penicillin.
wisdom.author: Jerry Lester

wisdom.sentence: "What do you give a man who has everything?" the pretty teenager asked her mother.  "Encouragement, dear," she replied.
What nonsense people talk about happy marriages!  A man can be happy with any woman so long as he doesn't love her.
wisdom.author: Oscar Wilde

wisdom.sentence: What passes for woman's intuition is often nothing more than man's transparency.
wisdom.author: George Nathan

wisdom.sentence: Whatever women do they must do twice as well as men to be thought half as good.  Luckily this is not difficult.
wisdom.author: Charlotte Whitton

wisdom.sentence: When a girl can read the handwriting on the wall, she may be in the wrong rest room.
When a girl marries she exchanges the attentions of many men for the inattentions of one.
wisdom.author: Helen Rowland

wisdom.sentence: When a man steals your wife, there is no better revenge than to let him keep her.
wisdom.author: Sacha Guitry

wisdom.sentence: When a woman gives me a present I have always two surprises: first is the present, and afterward, having to pay for it.
wisdom.author: Donnay

wisdom.sentence: When a woman marries again it is because she detested her first husband. When a man marries again, it is because he adored his first wife.
wisdom.author: Oscar Wilde

wisdom.sentence: When choosing between two evils, I always like to take the one I've never tried before.
wisdom.author: Mae West, "Klondike Annie"

wisdom.sentence: When God created two sexes, he may have been overdoing it.
wisdom.author: Charles Merrill Smith

wisdom.sentence: When God saw how faulty was man He tried again and made woman. As to why he then stopped there are two opinions.  One of them is woman's.
wisdom.author: DeGourmont

wisdom.sentence: When I was a young man, I vowed never to marry until I found the ideal woman. Well, I found her -- but alas, she was waiting for the ideal man.
wisdom.author: Robert Schuman

wisdom.sentence: When I'm good, I'm great; but when I'm bad, I'm better.
wisdom.author: Mae West

wisdom.sentence: When it comes to broken marriages most husbands will split the blame -- half his wife's fault, and half her mother's.
When Marriage is Outlawed, Only Outlaws will have Inlaws.
When one knows women one pities men, but when one studies men, one excuses women.
wisdom.author: Horne Tooke

wisdom.sentence: When the candles are out all women are fair.
wisdom.author: Plutarch

wisdom.sentence: When there is an old maid in the house, a watch dog is unnecessary.
wisdom.author: Balzac

wisdom.sentence: When women kiss it always reminds one of prize fighters shaking hands.
wisdom.author: H.L. Mencken, "Sententiae"

wisdom.sentence: When women love us, they forgive us everything, even our crimes; when they do not love us, they give us credit for nothing, not even our virtues.
wisdom.author: Honor'e de Balzac

wisdom.sentence: When you're bored with yourself, marry, and be bored with someone else.
wisdom.author: David Pryce-Jones

wisdom.sentence: Whenever I date a guy, I think, is this the man I want my children to spend their weekends with?
wisdom.author: Rita Rudner

wisdom.sentence: Where's the man could ease a heart like a satin gown?
wisdom.author: Dorothy Parker, "The Satin Dress"

wisdom.sentence: Why a man would want a wife is a big mystery to some people.  Why a man would want *___two* wives is a bigamystery.
Why isn't there some cheap and easy way to prove how much she means to me?
Why won't you let me kiss you goodnight?  Is it something I said?
wisdom.author: Tom Ryan

wisdom.sentence: Woman inspires us to great things, and prevents us from achieving them.
wisdom.author: Dumas

wisdom.sentence: Woman was God's second mistake.
wisdom.author: Nietzsche

wisdom.sentence: Woman's advice has little value, but he who won't take it is a fool.
wisdom.author: Cervantes

wisdom.sentence: Women are always anxious to urge bachelors to matrimony; is it from charity, or revenge?
wisdom.author: Gustave Vapereau

wisdom.sentence: Women are just like men, only different.
Women are like elephants to me: I like to look at them, but I wouldn't want to own one.
wisdom.author: W.C. Fields

wisdom.sentence: Women are not much, but they are the best other sex we have.
wisdom.author: Herold

wisdom.sentence: Women are wiser than men because they know less and understand more.
wisdom.author: Stephens

wisdom.sentence: Women aren't as mere as they used to be.
wisdom.author: Pogo

wisdom.sentence: Women can keep a secret just as well as men, but it takes more of them to do it.
Women complain about sex more than men.  Their gripes fall into two categories: (1) Not enough and (2) Too much.
wisdom.author: Ann Landers

wisdom.sentence: Women give themselves to God when the Devil wants nothing more to do with them.
wisdom.author: Arnould

wisdom.sentence: Women give to men the very gold of their lives.  Possibly; but they invariably want it back in such very small change.
wisdom.author: Oscar Wilde

wisdom.sentence: Women in love consist of a little sighing, a little crying, a little dying -- and a good deal of lying.
wisdom.author: Ansey

wisdom.sentence: Women reason with the heart and are much less often wrong than men who reason with the head.
wisdom.author: DeLescure

wisdom.sentence: Women sometimes forgive a man who forces the opportunity, but never a man who misses one.
wisdom.author: Charles De Talleyrand-Perigord

wisdom.sentence: Women treat us just as humanity treats its gods.  They worship us and are always bothering us to do something for them.
wisdom.author: Oscar Wilde

wisdom.sentence: Women waste men's lives and think they have indemnified them by a few gracious words.
wisdom.author: Honor'e de Balzac

wisdom.sentence: Women who want to be equal to men lack imagination.
Women's virtue is man's greatest invention.
wisdom.author: Cornelia Otis Skinner

wisdom.sentence: Women, deceived by men, want to marry them; it is a kind of revenge as good as any other.
wisdom.author: Philippe De Remi

wisdom.sentence: Women, when they are not in love, have all the cold blood of an experienced  attorney.
wisdom.author: Honor'e de Balzac

wisdom.sentence: Women, when they have made a sheep of a man, always tell him that he is a lion with a will of iron.
wisdom.author: Honor'e de Balzac

wisdom.sentence: "You are *so* lovely."  "Yes."  "Yes!  And you take a compliment, too! I like that in a goddess."
You ask what a nice girl will do?  She won't give an inch, but she won't say no.
wisdom.author: Marcus Valerius Martialis

wisdom.sentence: You can never trust a woman; she may be true to you.
You can't kiss a girl unexpectedly -- only sooner than she thought you would.
You have only to mumble a few words in church to get married and few words in your sleep to get divorced.

You just know when a relationship is about to end.  My girlfriend called me at work and asked me how you change a lightbulb in the bathroom.  "It's very simple," I said. "You start by filling up the bathtub with water..."
You know you're getting old when you're Dad, and you're measuring your daughter for camp clothes, and there are certain measurements only her mother is allowed to take.
You know, of course, that the Tasmanians, who never committed adultery, are now extinct.
wisdom.author: M. Somerset Maugham

wisdom.sentence: You lived with a man who wore white belts?  Laura, I'm disappointed in you.
wisdom.author: Remington Steele

wisdom.sentence: You think Oedipus had a problem -- Adam was Eve's mother.
"You're just the sort of person I imagined marrying, when I was little... except, y'know, not green... and without all the patches of fungus."
wisdom.author: Swamp Thing

wisdom.sentence: Young men want to be faithful and are not; old men want to be faithless and cannot.
wisdom.author: Oscar Wilde

wisdom.sentence: Youth had been a habit of hers so long that she could not part with it.
